title: FUSE magazine
content:
cheers

 [‹ Printing on Demand](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015170318/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40742 "Go to previous forum topic") [How close are you? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015170318/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40816 "Go to next forum topic")
author: yoyoyo

comments.content: We used to sell [FUSE](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015170318/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/FUSE) at FontShop but [our stock](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015170318/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/stewf/sets/72157602256155761/) has now run out. Brody’s site says that the magazine is still in production, but the last issue was released in late 2005.
